thread.title: William Shatner to set sail on Star Trek theme cruise | International
thread.title_full: William Shatner to set sail on Star Trek theme cruise | International | Travel |

author: torontosun.com
title: William Shatner to set sail on Star Trek theme cruise | International
text:
William Shatner and his Star Trek co-stars have signed up to embark on a fan cruise to mark the franchise's 50th anniversary.
Shatner, who portrayed Captain James T. Kirk in the sci-fi series, will be hitting the high seas other Star Trek favourites from all the TV spin-offs, including Jonathan Frakes, Denise Crosby, Robert Picardo, and James Darren.
During the cruise, fans will be treated to a "totally immersive" Star Trek experience featuring lectures, parties, and competitions with the actors, as well as a concert by the Enterprise Blue Band starring actors Vaughn Armstrong and Casey Biggs.
The six-day cruise with Norwegian Cruise Line departs Miami, Florida on 9 January, 2017, and will make stops in Cozumel, Mexico and the Bahamas.
Have you ever gone on a theme cruise?
